text: We caught up EXCLUSIVELY with Jessie James Decker and got the scoop about whether or not she ’ ll be returning to reality TV with another season of ‘ Eric & Jessie. ’ Plus, much more! Ever since season three of Jessie James Decker and Eric Decker ’ s reality show, Eric & Jessie, wrapped in Oct. 2017, fans have been anxiously waiting for more episodes. Unfortunately, it looks like that ’ s not going to happen. “ We probably won ’ t do another season of our reality show, ” Jessie told HollywoodLife EXCLUSIVELY, while promoting her new collection with JustFab. “ I feel good about closing that chapter. But I feel we love working together, so there ’ s always the possibility of doing television together in some capacity.
